#Frequently Answer Questions.

= urldigger FAQ =

*1. Why urldigger project?.*
Why not?. I am learning python and this project is a practical exercise to test the python language.

*2. Why would you be interested in urldigger?*
Maybe because you are a security researcher hungry for urls to test against [https://projects.honeynet.org/capture-hpc capture-hpc] for example. Maybe because you are the owner of a website and you would like to know if you have malicious code within it. Or simply because you're curious about trends in Internet.
